titles.title: Home Health Care Training Extension Act of 1987
A bill to amend section 339 of the Public Health Service Act to extend support for training programs for individuals who provide home health services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, OMB.

bill.summary: 5/14/1987--Introduced. Home Health Care Training Extension Act of 1987 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1988 through 1990 for existing programs regarding grants and contracts for training programs for paraprofessionals to provide home health care.
